Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located just north of Calgary city limits. 5 minute drive to Highway 2 (QE2) & Stoney Trail (Hwy1). Excellent access to nearby highways, a strong local labour force & amenities at Crossiron Mills Shopping Centre. Park neighbors include Sobey’s Distribution Centre (1.3 million SF), Lowes Canada Distribution Centre (1.2 million SF), The Home Depot Distribution Centre (418,000 SF), Smucker Foods Canada Distribution Centre (395,000 SF). High plains offers tenants a highly competitive tax savings, resulting in significantly lower annual occupancy costs as compared to Calgary. high plains park tenants will save approx. 57% or $1.47/sf average over a 10 year period. *Statistic provided by the Altus group.

'A' CLASS MULTI-TENANT FACILITY LOCATED NORTH OF CALGARY CITY LIMITS106,907 SF Remaining available in the building. Office to be built-to-suit.High Plains Industrial Park (HPIP) and CBRE are pleased to announce an additional new build to Western Canada's distribution hub. Building 8 will offer 185,000 square feet of warehouse space, comprised of roughly 20,000 square feet of office area with best in class build-to-suit expertise. Building 8 will represent a slight departure from formula and will blend the same industry leading features in a smaller package, with the goal to provide slightly smaller users the opportunity to join HPIP.High Plains offers tenants a highly competitive tax savings, resulting in significantly lower annual occupancy costs as compared to Calgary. Over the past five years, High Plains has become home to over five million square feet of industrial space. Park neighbors include Sobeys Distribution Centre (1.3 MSF), Lowes Canada Distribution Centre (1.2 MSF), The Home Depot E-commerce Distribution Centre (418,346 SF), Smucker Foods Canada (395,000 SF), and Gordon Food Service (275,000 SF).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 'A' CLASS MULTI-TENANT FACILITY LOCATED NORTH OF CALGARY CITY LIMITS. High Plains Industrial Park (HPIP) and CBRE are pleased to announce an additional new build to Western Canada's distribution hub. Building 8 will offer 185,000 square feet of warehouse space, comprised of roughly 20,000 square feet of office area with best in class build-to-suit expertise. Building 8 will represent a slight departure from formula and will blend the same industry leading features in a smaller package, with the goal to provide slightly smaller users the opportunity to join HPIP.High Plains offers tenants a highly competitive tax savings, resulting in significantly lower annual occupancy costs as compared to Calgary. Over the past five years, High Plains has become home to over five million square feet of industrial space. Park neighbors include Sobeys Distribution Centre (1.3 MSF), Lowes Canada Distribution Centre (1.2 MSF), The Home Depot E-commerce Distribution Centre (418,346 SF), Smucker Foods Canada (395,000 SF), and Gordon Food Service (275,000 SF).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Single Tenant or Multi-Tenant Opportunity. Clear span bays available with option to lease together or separately. Each unit equipped with drive-in doors, T5HO lighting, sprinklers and make-up air. Secured yard configurations available. Convenient Access to Major Thoroughfares. Quick access to the City of Calgary via the Stoney Trail Ring Road, Deerfoot Trail/Highway 2. Close proximity to various amenities. 2021 Operating Costs: $3.71 PSF + 4% Management Fee.

Single Tenant or Multi-Tenant Opportunity. Clear span bays available with option to lease together or separately. Each unit equipped with drive-in doors, T5HO lighting, sprinklers and make-up air. Secured yard configurations available. Convenient Access to Major Thoroughfares. Quick access to the City of Calgary via the Stoney Trail Ring Road, Deerfoot Trail/Highway 2. Close proximity to various amenities.
